```{r, echo = FALSE}
p <- pokemon %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Defense, y = Attack, color = `Type 1`)) +
  geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.7) +
  labs(
    title = "Attack vs Defense Scatter Plot",
    x = "Defense",
    y = "Attack",
    color = "Primary Type"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
ggplotly(p)
```
